name: Marine Glory
description:
Arrive in Brightbane and become captain of a mighty vessel. Fulfill quests and gather resources to buy new ships, crew members, abilities and much more. You'll need them when fighting fierce enemies and bosses on your adventure to defeat the great evil that threatens Brightbane.

Exploration

Explore multiple procedurally created universes and fulfill quests to gain loot and experience.
Every universe is unique and you can find lots of different enemies and loot.

Upgrade Ships

Buy and upgrade multiple ships with the loot from your explorations and quests. Each ship has different stats and you can boost them further via hiring crew members.

Master your abilities

Use your abilities on your adventure to get the best out of the capabilities of your ship. There are tons of offensive and defensive abiliities that you can obtain in different ways. Try them all out to find your unique playstyle.
